p: The jetPRIME TM transfection reagent was obtained from Polyplus-transfection Biotechnology Company (Strasbourg, France) and Genomic DNA Clean kit from ZYMO (Irvine, CA, USA). Annexin V-PE apoptosis detection kit was purchased from BD Pharmingen (Franklin Lakes, NJ, USA), ProLong TM Gold antifade reagent with DAPI from Invitrogen (Carlsbad, CA, USA), and caspase inhibitors z-VAD-fmk, z-DEVD-fmk, z-IETD-fmk, and z-LEHD-fmk from ApexBio (Houston, TX, USA). The pRK5-FLAG plasmid was obtained from Clontech. Anti-GAPDH (60004-1-Ig) antibodies was purchased from Proteintech (Wuhan, China), anti-FLAG M2 (F1804) antibodies from Sigma (City of Saint Louis, USA), anti-Hexon polyclonal antibodies and anti-PX monoclonal antibodies from CAEU Biological Company (Beijing, China), and FITC-conjugated goat anti-mouse IgG, horseradish peroxidase (HRP)-conjugated goat anti-mouse IgG antibodies from DingGuoShengWu (Beijing, China).
